init_hook:
function __log_echo() {
  if [[ "${REPO_SCRIPT_DEBUG-1}" == "1" ]]; then
    echo "$1"
  fi
}

__log_echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"
__log_echo "  Initializing Devbox: Go"
__log_echo "━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━"

__log_echo " ➜ GOPATH: $GOPATH"
__log_echo " ➜ GO_VERSION: $(go version)"

__log_echo " ➜ Create GOPATH directory"
mkdir -p "$GOPATH"
mkdir -p "$GOPATH/bin"
